properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1 v8 c1 v9 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yavvani athikramamulu mannimpabaduno Paapa parihaara mevadondeno vaade dhanyudu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehovaache nirdhoshigaa theercha badiyu aatmalo Kapatamu lenivaade dhanuyudu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mounivai yundina dinamella nejesi natti Aarthadwaniche naa yemukalu ksheeninchenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Divaaraatrul nee cheyi naa pai baruvai yunda Naa saaramu vesavilo yendinatlaaye{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nenu naa doshamunu kappu konaka nee Yeduta naa papamunu oppukontini{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee sannidhi naa paapamula noppukonagaa Neevu naa doshamunu manninchitivigaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kaavuna nee darshana kaalamandu Bhakhtigala vaaru ninnu praardhinchedaru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vistaara jala pravaahamulu porlinanu Nishchyamuga navi vaari meediki raavu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}naaku daagu chotu neeve shramalo nundi Neevu nannu rakshinchedavu naadu durgamaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vimochana gaanamulatho neevu nannu Aavarinchi naa kupadeshamu chesedavu{/lang-eng}
